reviewText: Pretty good mystery, with both US detectives and British on the scene. The best performance is by the Brit female detective who cuts corners in the finest Inspector Frost manner.  Brooke is very sexy in this, a bit too big perhaps, but hot.  Surprises along the way.
Howard yes man was at his best since private lessons
shipped on time everything was excellent thank you
Brooke Shields was beautiful in this movie set in the 80's where high glamour took place; the diamonds were beautiful in this movie as well
